headline: Jim Cramer on Deckers Outdoor: “I Think This One Has Got More Upside”
summary: Deckers Outdoor Corporation (NYSE:DECK) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. During the episode, Cramer praised the company’s recent earnings report and said: “… When the company reported last week, it delivered an excellent set of numbers, and the stock shot up more than 11% in a single session last Friday. So, […]
